column1: Specifications: "Indoor/outdoor 2K PoE camera with IR night vision and enhanced AI detection capabilities."
Advanced AI: Greater detection precision and range
Record audio with an integrated microphone
"Dimensions": "Without mount: Ø82 x 88.3 mm (Ø3.2 x 3.5\")\nWith mount: Ø82 x 153 mm (Ø3.2 x 6\")"
"Weight": "Without mount: 628 g (1.4 lb)\nWith mount: 765 g (1.7 lb)"
"Mounting material": "Wall mount: aluminum alloy\nPole mount: aluminum alloy"
"Night mode": "Built-in IR LED illumination and an IR cut filter"
"Ambient operating temperature": "-20 to 40° C (-4 to 104° F)"
"Mobile app": "UniFi Protect iOS™: Version 1.5.6 and laterUniFi Protect Android™:  Version 1.4.7 and later"
